comments.body: Add: please don't hide changes to this file in a "generated changes" commit, treat it as source code instead.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@ - `make generated_files UPDATE_API_KNOWN_VIOLATIONS=true`

It is up to API reviewers to review the list and make sure new APIs follow our API conventions.
